item.title: 西洋大学の終焉（せいようだいがくのしゅうえん）：芝大英语系“促进”研究“黑人抗争”
item.description: 芝加哥大学英语系全体「发考题」严正声明！ Faculty Statement (July 2020) The English department at the University of Chicago believes that Black Lives Matter, and that the lives of George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, Tony McDade, and Rayshard …
